name: dick
content:
dick noun [C]
(PENIS)
offensive a rude word for a penis
dick noun [C]
(PERSON)
offensive a rude word for a person, especially a man, who is considered to be stupid or unpleasant: That guy is such a dick.
US old-fashioned informal a detective (= someone whose job is to discover facts about a crime): a private dick
